mapper.sql: ID AS "id", CTID AS "ctid", BranchID AS "branchID", Address AS "address", AddressEN AS "addressEN", CompanyID AS "companyID", Contacts AS "contacts", ContactsEN AS "contactsEN", CreateTime AS "createTime", CreditAmount AS "creditAmount", CustomerUSBID AS "customerUSBID", LogisticsTypeID AS "logisticsTypeID", NameFull AS "nameFull", NameFullEN AS "nameFullEN", NameShort AS "nameShort", NameShortEN AS "nameShortEN", OracleID AS "oracleID", OracleIDSupplier AS "oracleIDSupplier", Phone AS "phone", PropertiesID AS "propertiesID", Settlement AS "settlement", SupplierUSBID AS "supplierUSBID", TERMS AS "terms", TaxNum AS "taxNum", NameInvoice AS "nameInvoice", IsOracleExternal AS "isOracleExternal", Email AS "email", UpdateTime AS "updateTime", CustomerLevelID AS "customerLevelID", SalesManID AS "salesManID", Fax AS "fax", Freezen AS "freezen", CHDState AS "cHDState", LastEditorID AS "lastEditorID", LastEditTime AS "lastEditTime", CDHReturnInfo AS "cDHReturnInfo", UpdateIndex AS "updateIndex", CSSState AS "cSSState", CSSReturnInfo AS "cSSReturnInfo", IsOnlySettlement AS "isOnlySettlement", CustSupCode AS "custSupCode", CRMStatus AS "cRMStatus", SRMStatus AS "sRMStatus", CreatorID AS "creatorID", IsNewCustomerCTP AS "isNewCustomerCTP", BusinessLine AS "businessLine", IsReimbursement AS "isReimbursement", CustomerStatus AS "customerStatus", ApplyReviseCustomer AS "applyReviseCustomer", CustomerInfo AS "customerInfo", ReviseCustomerRemark AS "reviseCustomerRemark", RejectRemark AS "rejectRemark", IsSendEmail AS "isSendEmail", VendorTerms AS "vendorTerms", AddCustomerInfoRemark AS "addCustomerInfoRemark", IsVNCustomer AS "isVNCustomer", OracleID1 AS "oracleID1", OracleIDSupplier1 AS "oracleIDSupplier1", OracleID2 AS "oracleID2", OracleIDSupplier2 AS "oracleIDSupplier2", OriginalMessage AS "originalMessage"
